message:
My dir tree is something like:
project \
 -- static\

 -- testapp\
 ---- manage.py
 ---- urls.py
 ---- and other

ep.io:
[django]
base = .       
/media = ../shortcuts/django-admin-media/
/static = ../static

[checkout]
directory_name = litsokniga

What should I do to make staticfiles work? App started and works fine.
I'm trying to upload test app on django
no .., those paths are relative to the tree you upload, not [django] base.
@andrewgodwin so static has to be in a "testapp" dir in my example?
@brabadu No - if it's in testapp the path would be testapp/static/
doesn't it need to be /static = static/ ?
@liorsion Yes; if you read the docs at http://www.ep.io/docs/epioini/#static-section it tells you about when you need slashes.
@andrewgodwin I know, I was just replying to your message above.. :)
